full_summary:
# Mailing Machine Procurement - Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01023015

**Publication Date**: January 25, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Contracting Authority**: Citizenship and Immigration Canada
**Address**: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada

## Request Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued to solicit proposals for the supply of a Mailing Machine for the Citizenship and Immigration Canada department. The RFP is being issued under the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E6HAL-140008.

**Scope of Work**

The successful contractor will provide one (1) medium-sized Mailing Machine, Category 4, for use in processing mail under the authority of the Citizenship and Immigration Canada department.

**Contract Duration and Delivery**

The contract will be for a period of 5 years, with a delivery timeframe of 20 calendar days from the signing of the contract.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection of the contractor will be based on a competitive evaluation process. Interested suppliers must submit a proposal that includes all required information and documentation.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or clarification regarding this RFP, please contact:
Tambeau, Jean-Philippe
Contracting Authority, Citizenship and Immigration Canada
Telephone: 873-408-0515
Email: [Jean-Philippe.Tambeau@cic.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-Philippe.Tambeau@cic.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**

A comprehensive set of instructions and requirements for the RFP can be downloaded from the [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). The procurement reference number is PW-23-01023015.

The Request for Proposal document is available in both English and French, and interested suppliers can access the documents by clicking on the links below:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/e7cd62bf5b17bb56e68e032d238af659/npp_-_cic-155880_english_final.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/0f545bd031de84fa97b6bc4953a0efa8
